physical_properties.material: storm-forged silver with lightning crystal inlay

effects.name: Lightning Affinity
effects.description: Increases lightning damage by 25-40% (scales with level)

effects.name: Storm Walker
effects.description: Allows movement at full speed during weather effects

effects.name: Hidden Path
effects.description: Reveals hidden passages in storm-touched areas

acquisition.rarity_notes: Only drops from storm-touched creatures during active thunderstorms

lore.description: This ring pulses with captured lightning, allowing the wearer to channel Voltharion's storm-walking abilities while maintaining connection to Myrielle's hidden paths.
lore.history: Originally crafted by storm-riders who bonded with Stormwing Eagles, these rings enable deeper communion with storm-touched mounts.
lore.creator: Master Stormsmith Ragnar
lore.significance: Represents the harmony between Voltharion's power and Myrielle's guidance
